permafrost.tundra.net.uri

Class URIQueryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.net.uri.URIQueryHelper

  • public class URIQueryHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with URI query strings.

                                      boolean decode)
        Parses a query string.
        Parameters:
        input - The query string to be parsed.
        decode - Whether to URI decode the values in the query string.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the parsed query string.

      • parse

        public static com.wm.data.IData parse(java.lang.String input,
                                      java.lang.String charsetName,
                                      boolean decode)
        Parses a query string.
        Parameters:
        input - The query string to be parsed.
        charsetName - The character set to use when decoding URI encoded values.
        decode - Whether to URI decode the values in the query string.
        Returns:
        An IData representation of the parsed query string.

      • emit

        private static java.lang.String emit(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Object value,
                                     java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                     boolean encode)
        Emits a query string given a name and value.
        Parameters:
        name - The query string parameter's name.
        value - The query string parameter's value.
        charset - The character set to use when URI encoding the parameter's value.
        encode - True if the parameter's value should be URI encoded.
        Returns:
        A query string containing the specified parameter.

      • emit

        private static java.lang.String emit(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Object[] values,
                                     java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                     boolean encode)
        Emits a query string given a name and array of values.
        Parameters:
        name - The query string parameter's name.
        values - A list of values for the query string parameter.
        charset - The character set to use when URI encoding the parameter's value.
        encode - True if the parameter's value should be URI encoded.
        Returns:
        A query string containing the specified parameter.

      • emit

        public static java.lang.String emit(com.wm.data.IData input,
                                    boolean encode)
        Emits a query string given an IData containing name value pairs.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData containing keys and values to serialized as a query string.
        encode - True if the query string parameters should be URI encoded.
        Returns:
        A query string containing the parameters in the given IData.

      • emit

                                    boolean encode)
        Emits a query string given an IData containing name value pairs.
        Parameters:
        input - An IData containing keys and values to serialized as a query string.
        charsetName - The character set to use when URI encoding the parameters.
        encode - True if the query string parameters should be URI encoded.
        Returns:
        A query string containing the parameters in the given IData.
